nodes.bodyText: I believe you can use other property names as the version. Shouldn't we just test if the version matches \$\{.*\}?

That's what I first thought, too. But that is not the case as @aloubyansky pointed out here: #7786 (comment)
See also the following bit from https://maven.apache.org/maven-ci-friendly.html:

In fact I had a very strange problem when I used a custom property in another project and back then I did not know that custom properties are not allowed.
Yeah, me neither. I should have added a small comment to this field but I forgot about that...
There is still time, the PR wasn't merged yet 😉

Ok, will add a comment once the last check has finished (Windows JDK 11 JVM Tests).
Edit: done!
